error.unauthorized: Make sure your api key has READ permission to 'Models' and WRITE permission to 'Model capabilities'
error.whisper_blocked: Whisper is blocked on your OpenAI project

data_description.prompt:
Prompt can be used to improve speech recognition of words or even names. You have to provide a list of words or names separated by a comma ", ".
Example: "open, close, Chat GPT-3, DALL·E"
